author: Source: KTEN-TV Denison
title: In Rwanda, dogs and handlers train to track poachers - KTEN-TV Denison
text:
7, 2015, tracker dog Bruno, 4, leads his handler Emmanuel Habimana across the savannah as he follows the scent of hidden park rangers playing the role of poachers, during a training exercise in A... . In this photo taken Monday, Sept.
 KTEN-TV Denison.
